name: TamilNaduTrivia
0:
”Alexa, start Tamil Nadu Trivia”
”Alexa, launch Tamil Nadu Trivia”
”Alexa, open Tamil Nadu Trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tamil nadu trivia
des:
This is Trivia or Quiz game about of Indian State of Tamil Nadu. It help users to develop the General Knowledge (GK) about the Tamil Nadu from history to current affairs. Which can be used in talent exams too. Every session will asks you 10 question related to Indian state of Tamil Nadu, and provides four multiple choice answers. The users can respond with one, two, three or four as answer to the question. 

Hundreds of GK Question about the state of Tamil nadu is in the archive, is growing continuously.

Anytime you can say 'Help' to find the rule of the Tamil Nadu Trivia Game.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
